original_text: And Tyrus did build herself a strong hold, and heaped up silver as the dust, and fine gold as the mire of the streets.
korean_text: 두로는 자기를 위하여 요새를 건축하며 은을 티끌 같이, 금을 거리의 진흙 같이 쌓았도다

sentences.original_text: And Tyrus did build herself a strong hold
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 티로는 자기 자신을 위하여 견고한 요새를 건축하였으며

sentences.original_text: and heaped up silver as the dust
and fine gold as the mire of the streets
